text: sillo geudaega seongseoleul bad-eun jadeul-ege modeun jingpyoleul gajyeoondaedo geudeul-eun geudaeui yebae banghyang-eul ttaleuji anh-eul geos-imyeo geudae yeogsi geudeul-ui yebae banghyang-eul ttaleuji anh-eul geos-ila. geudeul-eun seologa seoloui yebae banghyang-eul ttaleuji anhnola. geudaeege jisig-i dolaehan huedo jeongnyeong geudaega geudeul-ui yogguleul ttaleundamyeon, geuleohdamyeon geudaeneun jinsillo budanghan jadeul jung-ui hanaga doel geos-ila
